subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro turned aside 28 shots for his 12th career shutout and added an assist Thursday night to help the Islanders beat the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning, 4-0.
snippet: Rick DiPietro turned aside 28 shots for his 12th career shutout and added an assist Thursday night to help the Islanders beat the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning, 4-0.
